title: How to create a responsive navigation menu with CSS?
body: I'm trying to create a navigation menu for my website that adjusts nicely on different screen sizes. What CSS techniques should I use for responsive navigation menus? Any examples or libraries that can help?

title: What are the best practices for securing a Node.js application?
body: I'm building a Node.js application and want to ensure it's secure. What are the best practices and security measures I should implement to protect my application and user data?

title: How to optimize database queries for better performance in MySQL?
body: I have a MySQL database that's slowing down as my application grows. What are some strategies and techniques to optimize database queries and improve performance?

title: How can I implement user authentication in a React.js app using Firebase?
body: I'm building a React.js application and need to add user authentication. Can someone guide me on how to set up user authentication using Firebase?

title: What's the difference between REST and GraphQL for API development?
body: I'm confused about when to use REST APIs and when to use GraphQL in my project. Can someone explain the differences and use cases for each?

title: How to handle CORS issues in a Node.js and Express application?
body: I'm facing CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) issues in my Node.js and Express app. What's the best way to handle and configure CORS to allow requests from specific origins?

title: What are the key performance optimization techniques for a React Native app?
body: I'm working on a React Native app, and it's running a bit slow. What are some performance optimization techniques I can apply to make it faster and smoother?

title: How to deploy a Django web application to AWS?
body: I've developed a Django web app, and I want to deploy it on AWS (Amazon Web Services). Can someone provide step-by-step instructions on how to deploy a Django app to AWS?

title: What's the best way to organize a large codebase in a JavaScript project?
body: I'm working on a large JavaScript project, and the codebase is becoming difficult to manage. What are some strategies and best practices for organizing a large codebase?

title: How to implement pagination in a Ruby on Rails application?
body: I'm building a Ruby on Rails app, and I need to implement pagination for a list of records. Can someone provide guidance on how to implement pagination in a Rails application?
